Package net.sf.appia.protocols.group.bottom

Class Summary
GroupBottomLayer The group communication bottom layer.

OtherViews  
 

Package net.sf.appia.protocols.group.bottom Description

Appia Group Communication Bottommost layer.
This package contains the interface layer between the Group Communication layers above and the reliable point-to-point layers bellow.
